description.en: BiFi token serves multiple functions on BiFi’s multichain DeFi platform. It can be used as a governance token, used to vote on proposals to enhance or submit proposals for BiFi. It can also be used as a currency to pay for multichain DeFi services on BiFi and used in services on BiFi.
